Title: Makes veterans organizations eligible for monies appropriated to the state and municipal facilities program for the payment of capital costs
Summary: Makes veterans organizations eligible for monies appropriated to the state and municipal facilities program for the payment of capital costs.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to making veterans organizations eligible for funding under the state and municipal facilities program; and to amend chapter 54 of the laws of 2017, enacting the Capital Projects budget, in relation to including veterans organizations
